eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

functionDecorators.name: authorize
functionDecorators.description: Checks if transfer passes transfer rules.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send tokens to.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to send.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: will add automatic lockup for destination address sent address from.

functionDecorators.name: cleanSRC
functionDecorators.description: clean SRC20. available only for owner.

functionDecorators.name: doTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Do transfer and checks where funds should go. If both from and to are on the whitelist funds should be transferred but if one of them are on the grey list token-issuer/owner need to approve transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address to send tokens to.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to send.

functionDecorators.name: isWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Checks if a address already exists in a whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: managersAdd
functionDecorators.description: added managers. available only for owner.

functionDecorators.name: managersRemove
functionDecorators.description: removed managers. available only for owner.

functionDecorators.name: minimumsAdd
functionDecorators.description: adding minimum holding at sender during period from now to timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: gradual
parameterDecorators.description: true if the limitation can gradually decrease.

functionDecorators.name: minimumsClear
functionDecorators.description: removes all minimums from this address so all tokens are unlocked to send.

parameterDecorators.name: addr
parameterDecorators.description: address which should be clear restrict.

functionDecorators.name: minimumsView
functionDecorators.description: viewing minimum holding in sender during period from now to timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setIntercoinAddress
functionDecorators.description: setup intercoin contract's address. happens once while initialization through factory.

functionDecorators.name: setSRC
functionDecorators.description: Set for what contract this rules are.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: whitelistAdd
functionDecorators.description: Adding addresses list to whitelist. Available from whitelist with group 'managers'(managersGroupName) only.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: list of addresses which will be added to whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: whitelistReduce
functionDecorators.description: whenever anyone on whitelist receives tokens their lockup time reduce to daysAmount(if less).

parameterDecorators.name: daysAmount
parameterDecorators.description: duration in days. if equal 0 then reduce mechanizm are removed.

functionDecorators.name: whitelistRemove
functionDecorators.description: Removing addresses list from whitelist. Available from whitelist with group 'managers'(managersGroupName) only Requirements: - `addresses` cannot contains the zero address.

parameterDecorators.name: addresses
parameterDecorators.description: list of addresses which will be removed from whitelist.
